title: Jihad, Domestic Terror & Rigged Elections. The Warren Markowitz Show 11/3/2017
description: The Warren Markowitz Show, It's My World You Just Live In It. A soap box for Independent Ideas, current events and politics of the day. Its out, the DNC rigged their own Primary, its 30 days later and nothing new with the Vegas Shooter and then Halloween rolls around and we have a drive-by-terror attack in NYC . So When do we wake up and realize, the truth is out there (thank you x-files) and you should only believe half of what people tell you. Lets see where this goes. Shall we. Podcast: Galtspeaks.com Contact: Radio@galtspeaks.com Follow us on twitter.com/radiomarkowitz & Facebook.com/radiomarkowitz Spreaker-www.spreaker.com/show/the-warren-markowitz-show
